whatwed.title: Technology
whatwed.text: Our Coding and Robotics often presents champs with problems, and helps them learn how to make decisions and solve those problems.

whatwed.title: Arts
whatwed.text: Our Art activities includes Creative and Martial Arts which enhances building of Confidence and Creativity in Champs.

whatwed.title: Languages
whatwed.text: Learning to speak other languages avails Champs to access broader  opportunities life can present! Asides it being so much fun, our language classes are taught by specialist who uses these languages daily.
